source_caption_data.pre_caption: The video begins with a view of a dense forest covering a mountain slope, with clouds partially obscuring the peaks. As the camera moves forward, a winding road becomes visible, cutting through the forest and leading up the mountain. The sky is partly cloudy, with patches of blue visible through the clouds. The camera continues to move forward, providing a broader view of the forested mountain and the road snaking through it.
source_caption_data.pre_caption_prompt: The video is a scenery shot. You do not need to describe the subject motion.
source_caption_data.final_caption: The video begins with a view of a dense forest covering a mountain slope, with clouds partially obscuring the peaks. As the camera moves forward, a winding road becomes visible, cutting through the forest and leading up the mountain. The sky is partly cloudy, with patches of blue visible through the clouds. The camera continues to move forward, providing a broader view of the forested mountain and the road snaking through it.

bad_caption: The video opens with a close-up of a sandy beach where several crabs scuttle sideways along the shoreline. As the camera pans upward, a group of dolphins can be seen leaping out of the water in the distance. The camera then zooms out, revealing a long pier stretching into the ocean, with people walking and fishing along its length. The scene concludes as a flock of seagulls flies overhead, moving toward the horizon.
